page.title: 07CLUBS
page.content: The village hall houses most of the club events like WI,Red Cross, Horiticultural socity,Britsh Legion, Happy circle cover.Panomime socity, and Plumpton singers.The pavilion holdsthe youth club,Toddlers group and play group.The Scout hut holds Scouts,Guides, Cubs and Brownies. They have regular summer holiday camps in The rugby football,stoolball, ,tennis,cricket and archery all meet up at the playing field and play there.The and pool are played at the pubs.The stoolball club hasa junoir and senior teams New tennis courts should be used by the end of 1985.The playing field holds most of the sporting activities because it has marked out pitches.The varius teames in all the sports play mostly local villages.For a small villages many activities are well supported.
